text: Smithville, a small town in Mississippi located in Monroe county is home to 509 residents. In 2011 during the 2011 Tornado Outbreak Smithville was hit with a devastating EF5 tornado. The EF5 killed many people and leaving a permanent scar in the ground. Smithville residents where shocked my the devastation caused by the Tornado, a red SUV was picked up and throw into the towns water tower making a 6 inch dent in the water tower. Later towards the end of the tornados lifespan the tornado obliterated a cemetery and threw the tombstone of Gavin Camiolo into a Familyâ€™s window. Category:Tornadoes in the United States
title: 2011 Smithville tornado
